      public Utils()

  • Method Details

    • replacePlaceholders

      public static String replacePlaceholders(String input, Map<String,String> replacements)
      Replaces placeholders in a string with corresponding values from a map. Placeholders are of the form {{key}}.
      Parameters:
      input - The input string containing placeholders.
      replacements - A map containing keys and their corresponding replacement values.
      Returns:
      The input string with placeholders replaced.

    • getStringJsonSafely

      public static String getStringJsonSafely(com.google.gson.JsonObject input, String fieldName)
      Safely retrieves a string value from a JsonObject. Returns null if the field does not exist or is null.
      Parameters:
      input - The JsonObject to extract the field from.
      fieldName - The name of the field to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The string value of the field, or null if it does not exist or is null.

    • jsonArrayToStringArray

      public static String[] jsonArrayToStringArray(com.google.gson.JsonArray jsonArray)
      Converts a JSON array of strings into a Java String[] array.
      Parameters:
      jsonArray - The input JSON array.
      Returns:
      A Java String[] array containing the values. Skips non-string elements.

    • getStringArrayJsonSafely

      public static String[] getStringArrayJsonSafely(com.google.gson.JsonObject input, String fieldName)
      Safely retrieves a string array from a JsonObject. Returns null if the field does not exist, is null, or is not a valid JSON array of strings.
      Parameters:
      input - The JsonObject to extract the field from.
      fieldName - The name of the field to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A String[] array containing the values, or null if the field is missing or invalid.

    • parseCleanedJson

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject parseCleanedJson(String content) throws com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException
      Removes Markdown-style code block formatting (```json ... ```) and parses the JSON.
      Parameters:
      content - The raw string content from the LLM response.
      Returns:
      The cleaned JSON object.
      Throws:
      com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - If the content is not valid JSON.

    • splitLinesToArray

      public static String[] splitLinesToArray(String input)
      Splits a multiline string into an array of strings, where each line is an element. Handles different newline formats (\n, \r, \r\n).
      Parameters:
      input - The input string containing multiple lines.
      Returns:
      A string array containing each line as an element. Returns an empty array if input is null or empty.

    • deepCopy

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject deepCopy(com.google.gson.JsonObject original)
